name: Relax (PoyMakes)
description:
Satan's back from work. He just wants to relax but his family is nagging him for money. Hell is not what you think it is.

This game was made for the MiniJam 69 which had the theme "hell".

Bertrand Masse
Christophe Blanc
Hanaë Bonnafoux
Guillaume Lagay
Laura Maroulevski
